name: Dinner Hunter: Cook or die.
description:
HEY ! So you wanna play our game ! 

It's a little roguelike where you have to cook too ahah ! 

Interesting isn't it ? 

You have never cook like that ! 

Basics instructions :

Select your recipe with UP and DOWN arrow key !

Space for selecting a ingredient (care you can't go back) !

Enter for validating the recipe ! 

Move around the map with the classic ZQSD or WASD :)

Use arrow keys for attack in 4 possible directions !

Your cookedex is visible by pushing the P button !

When you are in the kitchen , use 1,2,3 to give your recipe to the customers ! 

Now you are ready to be a cook !

So good luck in your new job and have fun !
